about_the_game:
The recipe for success on the track? The perfect mix of speed and style. So it won't be hard to understand how the Speed and Style Pack can easily become your secret weapon to dominate every race! Four extraordinary racing cars are ready to make their engines roar and impress with the beauty of their iconic designs:
  • the 2016 Ford GT Race endurance champion;
  • the Audi R8 LMS, one of the most successful cars in Gran Turismo history;
  • the Corvette C8.R with its 500 hp of pure power;
  • the Nissan GT-R R35 Liberty Walk Silhouette Works 35GT-RR, by the legendary designer Ryu Asada.
Just one of them would make any collector happy… imagine having all four!

This DLC includes:
  • 2016 Ford GT Race
  • Audi R8 LMS
  • Corvette C8.R
  • Nissan GT-R R35 Liberty Walk Silhouette Works 35GT-RR

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Season Pass Vol. 1.

The recipe for success on the track? The perfect mix of speed and style. So it won't be hard to understand how the Speed and Style Pack can easily become your secret weapon to dominate every race! Four extraordinary racing cars are ready to make their engines roar and impress with the beauty of their iconic designs:

Just one of them would make any collector happy… imagine having all four!

This DLC includes:

short_description: The recipe for success? A mix of speed and style. Exactly what you will find in the amazing Speed and Style Pack: 2016 Ford GT Race, Audi R8 LMS, Corvette C8.R and Nissan GT-R R35 Liberty Walk Silhouette Works 35GT-RR are the 4 extraordinary cars waiting for you!
